input_schema.description: A cat photograph to evaluate for intentional framing — whether the composition feels deliberate and positions the cat as the natural focal point of the image.
A cat photograph to evaluate for subject placement and balance — whether the cat's position within the frame feels purposeful and creates visual equilibrium.
A cat photograph to evaluate for effective use of surrounding space — whether the negative space, background, and environment serve the cat as subject or compete with it.
A cat photograph to evaluate for compositional flow toward the subject — whether the visual structure of the image guides the viewer's eye naturally toward the cat.

description: Evaluates the intentional framing of a cat photograph — whether the composition feels deliberate and positions the cat as the natural focal point. Scores three dimensions: subject placement and balance, effective use of surrounding space, and compositional flow toward the subject.
